alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 8:24PM CDT until March 29 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Kiowa to 6 miles southeast of Alva, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. Accumulating small hail is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wakita, Burlington, Manchester, Amorita, Byron, Ingersoll, Driftwood and Waldron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulating small hail may make travel difficult.
